trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Evesham Township
There were no other sightings in Evesham Township on or around May 17th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWell my story started with me standing in the yard and i can't remember if i was dreaming or i was really awake....but when i looked up i saw clouds at first and i thought to myself i better get inside before it starts raining...so as im thinking about it i notice this dark shadow come from behind the cloud and i try to focus cause its pretty dark outside...thats when i noticed it was a UFO....i have never seen anything like that...it was round but it almost looked like a floating city but with no lights on...and while im in awe of the one i saw i didnt notice that there was smaller ones following behind it...I was frozen with fear cause i didnt know if i was getting taken or what was going to happen...but the next thing i know im in bed and i had to figure out if i was dreaming or was i really seeing something and i have been dealing with question for the last four years...
Summary: Saw what looked like to me an invasion...not sure what i saw
